articles.description: According to the source who claimed to have spoken to the royal, Princess Eugenie, 30, sounded 'very content' and said the baby is 'a complete dream'.
articles.content:
Princess Eugenie is 'doing really well' after giving birth to her baby boy 'via C-section due to her previous spinal surgery for scoliosis', a source told People magazine.

articles.title: Upcoming 'Cruella' Film Roasted For Looking Like 'Disney's Joker' After Gritty Trailer Drops - Comic Sands
articles.description: Fans are worried the new Disney trailer for 'Cruella' may turn into Disney's version of 'Joker,' which humanized the notorious DC villain.
articles.content:
Cruella De Vil, Cruella De Vil. If she doesn't scare you, no evil thing will.
